summary: An Ordinance approving the amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2186 for the improvement of Third Avenue West, from West Ray Street to West Etruria Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in The City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, and by constructing bulkheads where necessary; under Ordinance No. 21745, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof, shown on said roll, declaring the same to be a first lien thereon and providing for the collection of said assessment.
